name: outright-app
description: OUTRIGHT is a parametric typeface, intended for display use and as a vehicle for conversation. Itâ€™s look is based on the flat-sided gothic-style headlines found in newspapers made and distributed within prisons. The incisions mimic the inconsistencies in the printing techniques used on those newspapers back in the day.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
